property.name: userLevelDocumentation
property.configure:
Attribute specifying a URI to link to from an icon. Using the linkTarget parameter, you can control how the link is displayed.

To use this, drag it onto an icon in your model. Then double click on that icon to set the URL to link to. The linkTarget parameter specifies whether the link should be opened in a new browser window (the default), in the same browser window, in a lightbox, etc.

Note that this attribute can be used in combination with {@link LinkToOpenTableaux}. The latter provides a hyperlink that works within Vergil, whereas this attribute provides a hyperlink that works in an exported HTML page. For example, LinkToOpenTableaux might be used to provide a hyperlink to another model (a pointer to its MoML file), so that double clicking on the container of the LiveLink attribute opens the other model. If that container also contains an instance of IconLink, then when the model is exported to a web page, the container's icon can become a link to the exported page for the other model.

property.name: prop:height
property.configure: Parameter specifying the height of the editing box. This is an int that defaults to 20.

property.name: prop:width
property.configure: Parameter specifying the width of the editing box. This is an int that defaults to 60.

property.name: prop:displayText
property.configure: Parameter giving the text to display in the Ptolemy model. This defaults to "Content for Export to Web".

property.name: prop:linkTarget
property.configure:
Parameter specifying the target for the link. The possibilities are:
  • _lightbox: Open in a lightbox-style popup frame.
  • _blank: Open in a new window or tab.
  • _self: Open in the same frame as it was clicked.
  • _parent: Open in the parent frameset.
  • _top: Open in the full body of the window.
  • framename: Open in a named frame.
The default is "_lightbox".
